## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description    | Type                              | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | -------------- | --------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `type`    | `type`    | Button type    | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"` | `'button'`  |
| `variant` | `variant` | Button variant | `"glass" \| "primary"`            | `'primary'` |

| Event         | Description | Type                      |
| ------------- | ----------- | ------------------------- |
